item.title: Compelling Copy
item.description: Do you ever wish that there was an easy formula for writing persuasive (web) copy? The AIDA Copywriting Formula AIDA stands for: Attention: Grab their attention Interest: Interest them with interesting facts / uses / stats Desire: Make them come to the conclusion, “I WANT THIS” Action: Tell them exactly how to buy, and what will happen next. Learn More
